xal.extension.bricks

Class Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.bricks.Brick
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanNode, RootBrick

    public abstract class Brick
extends java.lang.Object
    Base node for holding views and other items
